    Given disabled people are constant innovators adapting to inaccessible world

    When ecological challenges require creative solutions

    And Alex's adaptive problem-solving should be valued
    And disability community's creativity should inform climate adaptation
    And the protocol should learn from how disabled people solve access problems
    And innovation from disability should strengthen ecological resilience
    And Alex's adaptive expertise should contribute to ecological solutions
    And disability innovation should be recognized as community resource
